Texts.Chs: 我不敢相信这不是香蕉！
Texts.Eng: I Can't Believe It's Not Banana!

Texts.Chs: 在#398味觉测试中，进行的是查看是否可以区分真的香蕉与‘我不敢相信它不是香蕉！’的味道。测试者坦白自己的确分不出。
Texts.Eng: In taste test #398, the subject was unable to distinguish between the taste of real banana (for a value of real, anyway) and that of 'I can't believe it's not banana!' banana-flavoured substitute. In fact, when presented with evidence to the contrary, she flatly refused to believe it.

Texts.Chs:
这是一个令人振奋的成功，因为该测试者在烹饪节目‘大猿厨房’曾获胜三次。根据我们最新研制的配方，只有不到0.1%的测试者可以指出替代品的不同。

或许可以用‘我不敢相信这不是香蕉！’替代香蕉，这样可以降低开销，并且降低运送规模。
Texts.Eng:
This marks a sounding success as the subject was a three-time winner of the cooking game show, 'Big Ape's Kitchen'. As of our latest formulation, less than 0.1% of subjects were able to discern the substitute.

Soon, it may be possible to replace up to 70% of bananas consumed by all Apex with 'I can't believe it's not banana!' coralcreep-derived paste, lowering costs and easing rationing procedures.
